detailsData.title: Winning Track Record
detailsData.content: We are known as being aggressive personal injury lawyers that get top results. We work relentlessly to obtain the best possible results in all of our cases.

detailsData.title: Financial Strength
detailsData.content: It is important to choose a law firm that has the financial resources to go the distance. We enjoy that financial position and regularly out-prepare our opponents.

detailsData.title: Experience
detailsData.content: Our firm regularly receives cases referred from other lawyers when it appears that their case will likely go to the courtroom and an experienced courtroom lawyer is required.

detailsData.title: Client Reviews
detailsData.content: Our law firm has over 190 5-star reviews on Google My Business. We pride ourselves on providing both excellent customer service and achieving great results for our clients.

companyName: Attorney Brian White Personal Injury Lawyers
valueProp: Over 20 years of experience helping Texas accident victims.

testimonalData.text: If I could give this firm 10 stars and 3 thumbs up I would!!! I strongly recommend a consult with them. My back and neck were injured as a result of being rear ended. The other person‘s insurance company offered me practically nothing to cover medical bills.
testimonalData.author: Melody D.

testimonalData.text: Excellent personal injury law firm. When someone crashed into my car in Houston, my first accident ever, it was very frightening and painful. I called my dad and he said, “if you have any pain, get a lawyer”.
testimonalData.author: Andrea D.

testimonalData.text: What an awesome group of people. I left another attorneys office and came to Mr. White's. From the beginning he was very attentive and actually treated me like a person and not a dollar sign. I hope I never have to use him again, but in the unlikely event that I do, I will know that my best interests are taken into account and I will be treated with the upmost respect and professionalism.
testimonalData.author: Billy
